AND LOWER(u.user_forename) LIKE LOWER(#{pattern})

AND LOWER(u.user_email) LIKE LOWER(#{pattern})

SELECT * FROM customers u LEFT JOIN cars r ON u.user_id = r.car_user_id LEFT JOIN repairs c ON c.repair_user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN parts p ON p.part_user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND u.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers (user_name, user_rc, user_detail, user_phone, user_email, user_forename, exists, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userRc}, #{userDetail}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userForeName}, #{exists}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE customers SET user_name = #{userName}, user_rc = #{userRc}, user_detail = #{userDetail}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_forename = #{userForeName}, exists = #{exists}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate} WHERE user_id = #{userId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cars (win, spz, km, car_info, end_date_error, feature_repair_date, done_work, exist, buyed_parts, car_user_id, start_date_error) VALUES (#{win}, #{spz}, #{km}, #{carInfo}, #{endDateError}, #{featureRepairDate}, #{doneWork}, #{exist}, #{buyedParts}, #{carUserId}, #{startDateError})

mapper.update: UPDATE repairs SET car_id = #{carId}, repairs = #{repairs}, start_date_of_repair = #{startOfRepair}, end_date_of_repair = #{endOfRepair}, tech_check = #{techCheck}, oil = #{oil}, repair_user_id = #{repairUserId} WHERE repair_id = #{repairId}
